argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_picn | |- _pi e. CC |
| 2 |  | #P_sinadd | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ _pi e. CC ) -> ( sin ` ( A + _pi ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` _pi ) ) + ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` _pi ) ) ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sin ` ( A + _pi ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` _pi ) ) + ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` _pi ) ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_cospi | |- ( cos ` _pi ) = -u 1 |
| 5 | 4 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` _pi ) ) = ( ( sin ` A ) x. -u 1 ) |
| 6 |  | #P_sincl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sin ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 7 |  | #P_neg1cn | |- -u 1 e. CC |
| 8 |  | #P_mulcom | |- ( ( ( sin ` A ) e. CC /\ -u 1 e. CC ) -> ( ( sin ` A ) x. -u 1 ) = ( -u 1 x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( ( sin ` A ) e. CC -> ( ( sin ` A ) x. -u 1 ) = ( -u 1 x. ( sin ` A ) ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_mulm1 | |- ( ( sin ` A ) e. CC -> ( -u 1 x. ( sin ` A ) ) = -u ( sin ` A ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( sin ` A ) e. CC -> ( ( sin ` A ) x. -u 1 ) = -u ( sin ` A ) ) |
| 12 | 6, 11 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( sin ` A ) x. -u 1 ) = -u ( sin ` A ) ) |
| 13 | 5, 12 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` _pi ) ) = -u ( sin ` A ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_sinpi | |- ( sin ` _pi ) = 0 |
| 15 | 14 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` _pi ) ) = ( ( cos ` A ) x. 0 ) |
| 16 |  | #P_coscl | |- ( A e. CC -> ( cos ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_mul01d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( cos ` A ) x. 0 ) = 0 ) |
| 18 | 15, 17 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` _pi ) ) = 0 ) |
| 19 | 13, 18 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` _pi ) ) + ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` _pi ) ) ) = ( -u ( sin ` A ) + 0 ) ) |
| 20 | 6 | #P_negcld | |- ( A e. CC -> -u ( sin ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_addid1d | |- ( A e. CC -> ( -u ( sin ` A ) + 0 ) = -u ( sin ` A ) ) |
| 22 | 19, 21 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` _pi ) ) + ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` _pi ) ) ) = -u ( sin ` A ) ) |
| 23 | 3, 22 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( A e. CC -> ( sin ` ( A + _pi ) ) = -u ( sin ` A ) ) |
